text:
Originally reported by: **Claudiu Popa (BitBucket: [PCManticore](http://bitbucket.org/PCManticore), GitHub: @PCManticore)**

---

```
#!python

class A:
    def __getitem__(self, index):
         return index + 1

a = A()
a[4] # this should be five
```

---
- Bitbucket: https://bitbucket.org/logilab/astroid/issue/124
title: Understand instance.__getitem__

text:
_Original comment by_ **Claudiu Popa (BitBucket: [PCManticore](http://bitbucket.org/PCManticore), GitHub: @PCManticore)**:

---

Add support for inferring subscript on instances, which will  use **getitem**. Closes issue #124.

_Original comment by_ **Claudiu Popa (BitBucket: [PCManticore](http://bitbucket.org/PCManticore), GitHub: @PCManticore)**:
